You get it, all right. You just can't handle it. Um... yo been teleported... from one pod... to another. Uh, disint re-integrated there. Mmm, sort of. It'll change the world right? As she speaks, Veronica pulls a dictaphone from her pocke recording the conversation.

Cheeseburger.
